name: CalFile â€“ Free State Tax Filing
description: File California state taxes free online; direct deposit refunds; file current and prior year returns
fullDescription: CalFile is California's free online tax filing service from the Franchise Tax Board, allowing eligible residents to file their state income tax returns at no cost directly with the state.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free California state tax return filing
- File current year plus two prior years
- Direct deposit refunds
- Instant confirmation of filing
- Secure, official FTB system
- Available in English and Spanish
howToGetIt:
1. Create a MyFTB account at ftb.ca.gov
2. Wait for CalFile to open (typically mid-January)
3. Gather W-2s, 1099s, and other tax documents
4. Log in and complete your return online
5. Review and submit electronically
6. Receive refund via direct deposit or check
